ovdesc.p: This application is used to record blacklist customers. While Onboarding or subsequently when the customer is found to be black listed, such customer details are recoded into this table for various reporting purposes.

desc.p: This field specifies the short name of the customer.
This field records the Time when the customer is identified as black listed.
This field specifies any other reference number provided. Input in Alphanumeric.
This field specifies if the same is a violation or not. Valid Input YES/NO.
This field specifies the Full name of the customer.
This field specifies the alias name for the customer.
This field specifies the first name of the customer
3-10 alphanumeric customer mnemonic or 1-10 numeric character
Must be a valid CUSTOMER number or mnemonic.
This field specifies the date on which the customer was identified as Blacklisted. Input Standard T24 date format.
This field specifies the date of Birth of the customer. Input Standard T24 date format.
This field specifies the alias name for the customer.
This field specifies the alias name for the customer.
This field specifies the Surname for the customer.
